name: KindaCool
description:
Have you ever wondered what would happen if you took the acclaimed shooter Superhot, where time only moves when you move, and completely reversed the mechanics? No? Oh.

Well I did, so I made a quick prototype, which turned out to be pretty fun, so I fleshed it out into a full game. And here it is – ten levels of top down shooter action, where the faster you move, the slower time moves.
